en.banner_describe: UnitedStack team will work with your existing IT team to depending on your business needs.
en.mirror_title: It cloud services experts, invite you to experience extreme cloud services
en.service_three_one_detail: We provide perfect and improve the operation manual and documentation, break the barrier of the cloud computing technology, all of the details at a glance, allowing you to easily control the cloud platform.
en.service_three_three_detail: Customized cloud platform training, targeted unriddling for you, save you valuable time for you to understand UStack has the characteristics of cloud.
en.service_three_two_detail: The same SLA guarantee and UStack public clouds, both performance and availability of business, let you enjoy the same as the public cloud service quality.
en.service_two_one_detail: UStack have cloud monitoring mode actively, all platforms exceptions will be the first time been UStack professional operations team awareness, and handle in the first place, let your cloud have no trouble back at home
en.service_two_three_detail: UStack public cloud operations teams it technical experts of 7 x 24 operational service, full-time cloud platform to monitor and provide the same as the UStack public cloud of fault response and processing speed, is the escort of your business.
en.service_two_two_detail: Upgrades (OaaS) without interruption, upgrade become simple and easy, you can continue to experience the UStack release the performance optimization and characteristics.
en.service_one_one_detail: UStack will according to your business application requirements for you to make your own private cloud platform, make your business in the cloud, free to expand and bring unprecedented cloud experience.
en.service_one_three_detail: UStack rapid deployment services, remote access automatic deployment platform, changed the traditional way cloud platform long deployment, let you have a cloud immediately.
en.service_one_two_detail: Against your business scale, and the future development planning of cloud resources capacity, balance of cost and performance, for you to make a set of suitable for their own cloud platform.
en.subject: Service profile
en.subject_introduction: Due to the hosting cloud deployment in your IT environment, only for your own use.UnitedStack to you completely API to develop all cloud services and deployment configuration options, so you can according to your own business requirements, proper adjustment and optimization, build on their own cloud service.
en.title: UnitedStack - Private Service

zh.banner_brief: 打造最适合您的业务的云计算环境
zh.banner_describe: 有云团队将根据您的业务需求，与您现有的IT团队一起，打造最适合您的业务的云计算环境。
zh.mirror_title: OpenStack 云服务专家，邀您体验极致的云服务
zh.service_three_one_detail: 我们提供完善健全的操作手册与文档，打破云计算的技术壁垒，所有细节一目了然，让您轻松驾驭云平台。
zh.service_three_three_detail: 定制化的云平台培训，针对性的为您答疑解惑，节省您的宝贵时间，让您深入了解 UStack 有云的特性。
zh.service_three_two_detail: 与 UStack 公有云相同的SLA保障，无论是性能还是业务可用性，都让您享受与公有云相同的服务品质。
zh.service_two_one_detail: UStack 有云的主动监控模式，所有平台异常都会第一时间被 UStack 专业运维团队感知，并在第一时间处理，让您的云无后顾之忧
zh.service_two_three_detail: UStack 公有云运维团队的 OpenStack 技术专家的7×24运维服务，全时的云平台监控，提供与 UStack 公有云相同的故障响应和处理速度，为您的业务保驾护航。
zh.service_two_two_detail: 无中断的升级方式（OaaS），升级变得简单无忧，您可以持续的体验UStack带来的性能优化和特性发布。
zh.service_one_one_detail: UStack 会根据您的业务应用需求为您量身打造自己的私有云平台，使您的业务在云端自由扩展，并带来前所未有的云端体验。
zh.service_one_three_detail: UStack 快速部署服务，远程接入全自动平台部署，改变了传统云平台漫长的部署方式，让您即刻有云。
zh.service_one_two_detail: 针对您的业务即有规模和未来发展，规划云资源的容量，平衡成本和性能，为您量身打造一套适合自己的云平台。
zh.subject: 服务概要
zh.subject_introduction: 由于托管云部署在您自己的IT环境中，仅为您自己所用。UnitedStack 向您完全开放所有云服务的 API 和部署配置选项， 因此，您可以根据您自己的业务需求，进行适当的调整与优化，打造属于自己的云服务。
zh.title: UnitedStack - 产品服务
